title: Requirements for European Alternatives ðŸ“‹
metaDescription: See the requirements we set for European digital alternatives. Our criteria ensure user-friendly, privacy-friendly and reliable services.
intro: To be featured by us, a service must meet the following criteria:
requirements: The service must originate from a European country*
The service must currently have its headquarters in a European country*
footnote: *By 'European country' we mean a member of the EU, or a country with close ties to the EU, such as Norway, Iceland, Switzerland, Liechtenstein, Ukraine, and the United Kingdom (England, Scotland, Northern Ireland and Wales).
